name: "Wolverine"
description:
21th artwork from the collection of pig
pig is the symbol of the wealth and fertility, so I’ve chosen the pig to represent this collection (in the first step). In this collection, I have portrayed pig in the form of characters, each representing a specific personality , stratum and symbol of a specific concept, in order to use these symbols and concepts into modern human life.
Road map:
This collection is included 100 artworks, which are in 10 sets of 10, that deal with negative and positive human behaviors and personalities. In each of sets, I’ve considered two good give away. Before uploading them, I will provide the necessary explanations and information about the give away.
In the third set, we’ll go to the comics superheroes.
In this part, I will have two give away.
The first give away :
The person who has the most purchases from 10 to 19 pigs, Twenty-fifth work in this collection (one of one / 1 edition) It will be given to that person as a give away 
I will announce the second give away on Twitter after uploading the 25th work.
